creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: three paneled white cotton huipil with multicolored embroidery on front and back; designs in embroidery include bird motifs, zigzags, chevrons, and floral decorations; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides and are decorated with velvet and metallic fiber; neck opening is circular and outlined with yellow and brown embroidery
title: Huipil
